text: is a retired long-distance runner from Japan, whose personal best in the men's 10,000 metres was 28:29.29, achieved at the 1993 World Championships. He won the silver medal in the 10,000 m from the 1993 East Asian Games in Shanghai. ==Achievements== {| |- |1993 |World Championships |Stuttgart, Germany |align="center" | 15th |10,000 m |} ==References== * Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Tadashi Fukushima
